pages.text: These machines continuously generate materials over time. They will push their items or fluids to adjacent containers if possible.
The $(item)Cobblestone Generator$() continuously generates cobblestone at a specific rate by the combination of water and lava.
The $(item)Infinte Water Source$() produces water at a specific rate by the usage of an infinite water source.
The $(item)Nitrogen Collector$() separates and collects nitrogen from the air at a specific rate.
